docs.text: Home For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Heroku Cheat Sheet Enter console: heroku run console -a app-name Enter logs: heroku logs -tail -a app-name Check DB Status: heroku run rake db:migrate:status -a app-name Run DB Migrate: heroku run rake db:migrate -a app-name Rails Ruby Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Home
